ARABIC: وَءَاتَيْنَٰهُم مِّنَ ٱلْءَايَٰتِ مَا فِيهِ بَلَٰٓؤٌا۟ مُّبِينٌ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and We gave them Signs containing a clear trial.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And sent them tokens to bring out the best in them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and bestowed upon them the Signs wherein lay an evident test for them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and sent them revelations of which some were a clear trial for them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And We gave them signs in which lay clear favours.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And granted them signs in which there was a plain trial.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And We gave them of the communications wherein was clear blessing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and gave them signs wherein there was a manifest trial.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And We gave them portents wherein was a clear trial.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and showed them signs in which there was a clear test.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And We vouchsafed Unto them signs wherein was a manifest favour.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and We gave them some signs in which there was a manifest test.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And granted them Signs in which there was a manifest trial
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And granted them signs in which there was a plain trial.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And gave signs to them in which there was a clear trial.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And We gave them many signs, in which was an obvious test.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And We gave them of signs that in which there was a clear trial.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [44:33] And We gave them signs in which there was a manifest trial, an obvious grace, such as the parting of the sea, [the sending down of] manna and quails and other such [signs].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And We gave them portents) signs (wherein was a clear trial) and it is this that saved them from Pharaoh and drowning, and He sent down for them quails and honey in the wilderness, etc.; it is also said that (wherein was a clear trial) means: wherein was a great blessing.
